QuestData.Title: Seared Scourge
QuestData.Description: Whatcha waitin' fer, $c? Them shcourged trolls ain't gunna kill themselves!$b$bYou know the drill. Git up ta Drak'Tharon up north... Take some o thish here grog and hurl it at 'em from a distance...<hic>. Then jusht sit back an' watch 'em burn.
QuestData.LogDescription: Mack at Granite Springs wants you to use his grog to burn 30 Famished Scourge Trolls.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done!$B$B<Mack laughs hysterically for a moment.>$B$BAww, come on now. That was funny...hic.
